verbs.description: [V: Fasten] [ARG1: your seat belts] . Dramatic swings in the oil market may soon become the norm . After a prolonged period of low prices and relative calm , oil watchers are predicting a surge of volatility following President Trump 's decision to reimpose sanctions on Iran .
